attributes.action: Provide the necessary permissions to allow us to create a community council.
attributes.additional_details: Our team are available to help with any questions you may have regarding our proposed services, Our community action plan and much more information on how we intend to deliver our services.
attributes.background: We want to Develop and operate a local community council for the east end of port glasgow, providing services to our communities, reduce anti social behaviour, underage drinking, drug misuse support and provide services to help the elderly.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
